Articles.Content:
I'm running 64 bit 1.3.1 with several mods (Airplane Plus, Autogarage, BD Armory, Chatterer, KAS, Near Future Solar, plus a few others), and the game crashes right after it finishes loading. The problem surfaced when I installed Kerbal Konstructs, but removing it stopped the crashes.

I'm not running out of memory, and since it's 64 bit KSP, it *should* run fine.

Here's a crash log:

Unity Player [version: Unity 5.4.0p4_b15b5ae035b7]

mono.dll caused an Access Violation (0xc0000005)
  in module mono.dll at 0033:45590e6a.

Error occurred at 2017-10-15_203454.
H:\Kerbal Space Program\KSP_x64.exe, run by Henry.
39% memory in use.
16290 MB physical memory [9928 MB free].
20386 MB paging file [13064 MB free].
134217728 MB user address space [134214706 MB free].
Read from location 00000010 caused an access violation.

EDIT: Removing Kerbal Konstructs didn't decrease memory usage much. The game would crash at ~2.1GB, but it's running fine (without Kerbal Konstructs) using 2.6GB.

Edited October 16, 2017 by tyttuutface
Do not expect your 1.3.0 mods to work in 1.3.1. Unless you have the beta, BD armory is not compatible with 1.3.1.

12 minutes ago, Jas0n said:

Do not expect your 1.3.0 mods to work in 1.3.1. Unless you have the beta, BD armory is not compatible with 1.3.1.

There's mods that aren't compatible like BD armory as Jas0n says, go around and check your mods to see if they're compatible or just remove all your mods, either works.
a good thing to do before updating is to remove your mods, update, and then test each mod for compatibility. or just wait until a 1.3.1 update comes out.

On 10/16/2017 at 5:22 AM, Jas0n said:

Do not expect your 1.3.0 mods to work in 1.3.1. Unless you have the beta, BD armory is not compatible with 1.3.1.

to put it simply and to explain why it's crashing just before starting is because some of your mod plugins are compiled for 1.3.0 and not 1.3.1. so they crash when just about to load the main menu. 

 

do what everyone is saying. update your mods 1 by 1
